properties.address: All Saints' Church Centre, Southampton, Hampshire SO16 7DL
properties.description: Open from 21-11-2022. All are welcome. We are a small group of people but are looking forward to welcoming you here.

properties.description: Over 18s We offer a clean, stress free safe area for you to come and meet likeminded people, have some biscuits and a cuppa, perhaps try some arts & crafts, or some board games. We also have some computers available to help you with basic IT queries .
properties.title: Friends of St. James' Park

properties.address: King's Church Centre , 414 Coxford Road, Southampton SO16 5LL
properties.description: Open from 21 November. All welcome Monday mornings - A warm welcome with free hot drinks/biscuits. Closed on 26 Dec and 2 Jan. On Sundays we have free refreshments served 10.30-10.50am prior to our service which you would be most welcome to join.
properties.title: Kings Church
